svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2021-01-13T14:12:50.267Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.141 Safari/537.36" etag="2-CQIslaUw3SQsMXKDkc" version="14.1.9" type="google"><diagram id="-zrSk6uI70QsAjGnEFrG" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 521px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Mecanismos de Protección

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 85px; margin-left: 81px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Objetivos y Principios

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Es útil proteger los elementos de los usuarios, pero antes van los recursos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 220px; margin-left: 161px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Hace referencia a un mecanismos para controlar el acceso de los procesos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 160px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Los procesos deben ser protegidos de otros procesos y sus efectos.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 600px; margin-left: 121px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Como los usuarios tienen jerarquía, se hacen cuentas para cada uno

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 520px; margin-left: 151px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Esto se extiende a los usuarios y los sistemas que se relacionen

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 440px; margin-left: 161px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Todos los programas deben tener los privilegios suficientes

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 400px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 1) Principio del mínimo privilegio

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 161px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Las amenazas van desde alguien no autorizado o incompetente

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 680px; margin-left: 81px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: El SO proporciona mecanismos para activar los privilegios cuando se necesite

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 760px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Como los usuarios tienen jerarquía, se hacen cuentas para cada uno

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 85px; margin-left: 377px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Dominio de protección

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 160px; margin-left: 297px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Se refiere a cuánto alcance debemos de preocuparnos por proteger

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 340px; margin-left: 457px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Un proceso solo debe de acceder a lo que tenga autorización

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 220px; margin-left: 457px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Un sistema informático es una colección de procesos y objetos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 460px; margin-left: 457px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Un proceso opera bajo un dominio de protección: un conjunto de objetos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 297px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: En esencia, los objetos son tipos abstractos de datos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 400px; margin-left: 297px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 2) Principio de la necesidad de conocer: limita el daño de un proceso

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 640px; margin-left: 297px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Esa asociación puede ser dinámica o estática. Si es fija se usa el principio 2.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 580px; margin-left: 457px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Los dominios, al igual que en la teoría de conjuntos, se pueden superponer

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 520px; margin-left: 297px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Se dice que tiene derecho de acceso al tener la capacidad de ejecutar operaciones

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 760px; margin-left: 297px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Un usuario y un proceso pueden ser un dominio cada uno

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 700px; margin-left: 457px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Si es dinámica entonces, debe permitir conmutación de dominios

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 75px; margin-left: 811px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Matriz de acceso

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 240px; margin-left: 591px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Llamamos a la matriz access, y una entrada como access(i, j)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 180px; margin-left: 751px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Lo anterior se puede poner en una matriz. Filas: dominios; columnas: objetos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 180px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: La más fácil es una tabla global de tripletas: dominio, objeto, conjunto

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 240px; margin-left: 1040px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Aunque como es grande, conservarla en la memoria principal es difícil

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 115px; margin-left: 671px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Teoría

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 115px; margin-left: 961px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Implementación

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 300px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Mediante lista de accesos, cada columna es una lista (los objetos)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 540px; margin-left: 751px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Permite modificación a si misma, y tiene 3 operaciones más: copy, owner y control

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 480px; margin-left: 591px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Cuando se realiza una conmutación de dominio se ejecuta una operación switch

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 751px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: La matriz proporciona los mecanismos para la asociación estática y la dinámica

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 360px; margin-left: 591px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Una política relativa a la protección nos dice qué derecho tiene quién

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 300px; margin-left: 751px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Se puede tener decisiones de política: en una entrada access(i, j)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 780px; margin-left: 751px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Ambos son para evitar que los derechos se propaguen.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 720px; margin-left: 591px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Ambos modifican las entradas de la matriz access.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 660px; margin-left: 751px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: El derecho de owner, controla el derecho de añadir o quitar derechos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 600px; margin-left: 591px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Selecciona uno de los derechos: copia,
transferencia, y copia limitada

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 480px; margin-left: 1040px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: El esquema bloqueo-clave es un compromiso entre ambas listas

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: En este, cada objeto tiene una etiqueta para denotar su tipo

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 360px; margin-left: 1040px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: En caso contrario, se pueden hacer listas para las filas (los dominios)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 540px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Cada objeto tiene una lista de bit distintivos llamados bloqueos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 660px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Sin embargo, aunque es más complicado, lo que se suele usar son las listas

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 720px; margin-left: 1040px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Al primer acceso se verifica la lista y se otorga derechos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 600px; margin-left: 1040px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Cada dominio tiene una clave, entonces se gestionan las tuplas bloqueo-clave

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 780px; margin-left: 881px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Al último acceso se destruye la capacidad, como en CAL y MULTICS

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 832px; margin-left: 231px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Control de acceso

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 832px; margin-left: 521px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Revocación de derechos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 870px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: A cada archivo y directorio se le asigna un propietario

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 940px; margin-left: 31px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Esto mismo se puede hacer con otros elementos, como en Solaris 10

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1010px; margin-left: 81px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Esta función gira en torno a privilegios: derechos a ejecutar llamadas del SO

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1080px; margin-left: 151px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Los privilegios también se pueden asignar a roles, y los usuarios los tienen

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1150px; margin-left: 231px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Tener un rol activa privilegios que activa derechos

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1010px; margin-left: 311px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Temporal o permanente

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1150px; margin-left: 391px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Parcial o total

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1055px; margin-left: 471px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Selectiva o general

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 965px; margin-left: 471px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Inmediata o diferida

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 885px; margin-left: 391px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Tipo

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 885px; margin-left: 816px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Implementación

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 940px; margin-left: 631px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Readquisición: Cada tanto se borran las capacidades de los dominios

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1030px; margin-left: 671px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Retropunteros: Los objetos tienen lista de punteros, si revoca sigue punteros

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1100px; margin-left: 816px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Indirección: Las capacidades apuntan la tabla, revocar es borrar la entrada

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 940px; margin-left: 991px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Claves: Las capacidades son claves en bits. Definida al crearla

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1030px; margin-left: 991px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Los objetos tienen una clave maestra, usada para comparar las demás claves

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1140px; margin-left: 671px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Este esquema no permite revocación selectiva

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1120px; margin-left: 991px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #1D3557; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: La revocación solo sustituye a la clave maestra con otro valor con set-key

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
